content.text: 3/4 cup butter, divided
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "3/4 cup butter, divided" )

content.text: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "2 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided" )

content.text: 4 portobello mushroom caps, sliced
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "4 portobello mushroom caps, sliced" )

content.text: 1 clove garlic, chopped
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 clove garlic, chopped" )

content.text: 3/4 cup all-purpose flour, divided
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "3/4 cup all-purpose flour, divided" )

content.text: 1 (14.5 ounce) can beef broth
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1 (14.5 ounce) can beef broth" )

content.text: 1/2 cup dry Marsala wine
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1/2 cup dry Marsala wine" )

content.text: kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste" )

content.text: 1 tablespoon browning sauce
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "1 tablespoon browning sauce" )

content.text: 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded to 1/2 inch thickness
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded to 1/2 inch thickness" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Melt 1/2 cup butter and heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat.
2) Cook and stir the mushroom slices in the skillet until tender.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Cook and stir"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "mushroom slices"@21:36 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until tender"@52:64 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "the skillet"@40:51 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Remove from heat, cover to keep warm, and set aside.
4) Melt the remaining butter and heat the remaining oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Melt"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the remaining butter"@8:28 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "a saucepan"@59:69 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "medium-high heat"@75:91 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "heat"@33:37 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the remaining oil"@38:55 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-1 "a saucepan"@59:69 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-4-1 "medium-high heat"@75:91 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Cook and stir the garlic until tender, then gradually whisk in the flour.
6) Increase heat to high, and pour in the beef broth and Marsala wine.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Increase"@3:11 / AC
		:gol ( temp-6-0 "high"@20:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:ppt ( "heat"@12:16 / OTHER )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "pour in"@30:37 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "beef broth"@42:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "Marsala wine"@57:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Season with kosher salt and pepper, and whisk in the browning sauce.
8) Bring to a boil, and reduce heat to low.
9) Mix in the mushrooms, reserving remaining butter and oil in the skillet.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Mix in"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( "mushrooms"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:simultaneous ( ac-9-1 "reserving"@-1:-1 / AC
			:ppt ( "remaining butter"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
			:ppt ( "oil"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
			:loc ( tool-9-0 "the skillet"@-1:-1 / TOOL )
		)
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Cover saucepan, remove from heat, and set aside.
11) Season chicken with salt and pepper, and dredge in the remaining flour.
12) Cook the chicken 2 minutes per side, until browned.
13) Arrange the chicken in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish, and cover with the sauce and mushroom mixture.
14) Cover baking dish, and bake 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until chicken juices run clear.
content.eamr:
( inst-14 / R
	:inform ( ac-14-0 "Cover"@4:9 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-14-0 "baking dish"@10:21 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-14-1 "bake"@27:31 / AC
		:duration ( dur-14-0 "25 minutes"@32:42 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-14-0 "until chicken juices run clear"@69:99 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-14-1 "the preheated oven"@46:64 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
